description: This beautiful apartment has daylight and is furnitured with beautiful antic furniture .  The building is new , has a Rooftop , elevator , dog spa and much  more ! In beautiful east village where are all the nice bars , restaurants and clubs . This place is renovated , quite but still very good located in Manhattan . Close to SoHo and everywhere you wanna go . Few blocks from the subway .
name: Luxury apartment in East village !
